data.title: 30 Photos Of Hiten Tejwani And Gauri Pradhan That Are Pure Couple Goals
data.meta_description: Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan are one of the OG couples of the Indian television industry. We want to make you smile and believe in true love, so here's the best of their cute social media timeline.
data.text:
Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan are one of the OG couples of the Indian television industry. The two met on the sets of a TV show, worked together as a reel-couple and ended up falling in love for real . It doesn't get better than this! We first saw the couple on-screen in Kutumb and later Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi and while it's been close to two decades, we still smile when we see the two of them together. The couple are parents to eight-year old twins, have been married for fourteen years, and have know each other for almost two decades... and their social media PDA is better than it ever was. Mainly to spread smiles and make you believe in true love, here's a look at their social media cuteness.

Sneakily filming your wife, while at the movies: check!

Here's another one.

Andd one more...

If this doesn't define forever we don't know what does!

The photo's cute and Hiten's captions are cuter.

Holiday done right. This vacation happened right after Hiten came out of Bigg Boss season 11.

Gotta love this fam jam!

And this one.

The duo sure knows how to get into the Holi mood.

Another #Holifie

So cute.

‚ù§

That's Diwali done just right.

Playing dress up... and totally winning the game!

They keep getting cuter, and cuter!

We are also totally in love with Hiten's photo caption skills!

No seriously guys, take notes!

Who isn't going to love that?!

Oh and did we mention how much we love their holiday selfies?!

One more #Holidayfie

And that caption....

Just.

Look.

At.

Them!

Who can forget their beautiful interaction in Bigg Boss?!

Too cute. Can someone please cast these two in a show; we need to see more of this on-screen.

Love them!

And their fam!

#CoupleGoalsForLife
